title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: Dokotoo Womens 2025 Winter Fall Solid Turtleneck High Neck Balloon Long Sleeve Sweaters Pullover Outerwear

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made with a pretty knit and yellow color, describing it as a loose-fitting turtleneck that's not scratchy or too hot.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: I love this sweater. It is big and cozy, just what I was after. It held up to delicate wash and dry cycles just fine. The shoulders on mine look good, and I think if I don’t hang it like a shirt, they will stay that way. I’m 5’2” 160lbs & got a large. Fit is exactly what I was after Read more
items.author: Lara S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute I have 5 in different colors!
items.body: Cute color, soft fabric, fit perfect, thin enough to not get overheated but thick enough to not need a shirt underneath, washes easily (I lay it flat to dry, though), and SO cozy. I get compliments on these sweaters all the time -- I have 5 different colors of them and wear them regularly in the fall and winter. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: K.L.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, thick and warm
items.body: Soft, think and warm. Great for those supper cold days when you just want a snuggly sweater. Arm length is good which is always a struggle for us tall girlies. Read more
items.author: Girl mama

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great baggy sweater
items.body: This Dokotoo sweater is exactly as pictured. I love the grey-green color and the large, loose turtleneck. I hate tight things around my neck! It's a chunky yarn material, some people might prefer wearing a tank underneath for added warmth because of the chunky knit. I run hot so it's perfect for me. I ordered my usual size M and it's a perfect fit, no need to size up you get that baggy look. It's not too long or cropped, just right for us short girls (5'3), sits just below my waist. If you have long arms it might be more of a 3/4 sleeve on you but I do not. Read more
items.author: MN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars great rolled neck/bottom sweater, perfect fit. Itchiness varies by color.
items.body: I love this sweater! Material is a bit itchy to me. I just machine washed it with conditioning product. Softened up with minuscule shrinkage. Laid flat to dry, this by choice, so IDK if the dryer would shrink it. Fits to suggested size. The color is more of a tan/brown color which I love. I like the sweater so much I ordered in black :) UPDATE: I ordered an additional sweater; the cream navy and green. Extremely itchy, have to wear a Tneck under it to protect from itching. Colors are true to photo. Too bad, really cute, but cant tolerate the rough material’s itching. I have another color coming tomorrow, hopefully it isn’t itchy like my prior one wasn’t - washed with softener and what little stiff itchy was alleviated . This second sweater was, in my opinion so much itchier that even fabric softener wouldn’t help. Read more
items.author: doc

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Different this year.
items.body: I bought two sweaters like this last winter they fit perfect as they look in the picture. I love them so much. I ordered one this October. It was a total different fit. The sweater was shorter, and the sleeves are short three-quarter length on me. The two that I did order last year the sleeves are nice and long that I even have to cuff them up if I want. I will not return the sweater because I really like it. I did get it in the dusty pink and it’s very pretty. It’s just that I was disappointed in the fit. Last year I bought the beige and the dot green and they are both gorgeous and the fit is perfect. I won’t order another one this year because I’m afraid they won’t fit properly. Read more
items.author: Valery

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, Warm and feeling fall
items.body: This sweater is soft and not itchy at all. It’s nice and big all over so it’s oversized in the best comfy ways. I get so many compliments on my yellow sweater every time I wear it. Read more
items.author: SARAH

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but not thick or chunky
items.body: Nice sweater with comfy fabric, but not as described. Sleeves are short even on a small person. After washing I tried gently stretching them but that didnt work. It's not thick fabric - pretty average for a sweater. Not worth $35. listed. But with the $10 coupon, price is OK for an everyday top. Read more
items.author: snowdogs

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A1 Rose, B Khaki, B Purple, A Gray 3, A Turquoise Green, A Pink, A Yellow, A1 Purple, A Light Brown, B Black, C Brown 01, A Gray, C Brown, A1 Sky Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
